participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and reflective, Emily enjoys quiet moments and values personal connections over social media.
participant_1.background: I have a pet cat who loves to nap on my bed. I am far away from my sister and family. I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees! I like to spend my free time doing activities that I can profit from, like selling items online or doing odd jobs for people. I drive a van.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and dedicated, Jordan is passionate about education and finds joy in caring for his dog.
participant_2.background: I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions. I've never been to the west coast of the United States. I did not finish college. I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success. I have two full sleeves of tattoos.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do in your free time?
I'm a teacher so I don't have much of a social life. I mostly just take care of my dog and read a lot.
That's understandable. I have a pet cat that I love to spend time with. I'm also a stay at home mom so I don't have much of a social life either.
I've never been to the west coast of the United States. Have you?
I have! I live in California and I love it here. The weather is great and there's always something to do.
I've heard great things about California! I'm planning on visiting someday soon.
You should! It's a beautiful state.
I have a full sleeve of tattoos. Do you have any tattoos?
I don't have any tattoos. I'm not sure if I would ever get one.
I think they're pretty cool. I got mine when I was 18 years old.
I'm glad you like them! I'm not really into body modification but I respect people who do it.
I try to be. I think everyone should be able to do what they want with their own bodies.
